import sys

def main():
    n = int(sys.stdin.readline())
    a = list(map(int, sys.stdin.readline().split()))
    print(a)

if __name__ == '__main__':
    main()


N, K = map(int, input().split())
A = []

for i in range(K):
    d = int(input())
    A.append(list(map(int, input().split())))

A_flat = set()
for i in range(K):
    A_flat.update(A[i])
A_flat = set(A_flat)

ans = N - len(A_flat)
print(ans)

N, K = map(int, input().split())

A = []
for i in range(K):
    d = int(input())
    A.append(list(map(int, input().split())))

A_flat = []
for i in range(K):
    A_flat.extend(A[i])
A_flat = set(A_flat)

ans = N - len(A_flat)
print(ans)


from functools import partial

N, K = map(int, input().split())

A = []
for i in range(K):
    d = int(input())
    A.append(list(map(int, input().split())))

A_flat = []
for i in range(K):
    A_flat.extend(A[i])
A_flat = set(A_flat)

ans = N - len(A_flat)
print(ans)

import sys

def main():
    n, k = map(int, sys.stdin.readline().split())
    survivors = set([i for i in range(1, n+1)])
    for _ in range(k):
        d = int(sys.stdin.readline())
        survivors -= set(map(int, sys.stdin.readline().split()))
    print(len(survivors))

if __name__ == '__main__':
    main()
